textAfterTable: Ticket prices exclude live entertainment tax as well as a $10.95 service fee. Treat yourself to the best seats in the house! Golden Circle seating is located in the center 6 rows of Section 103 of the ARIA Showroom, offering premium views of this amazing spectacular. Both Golden Circle and Banquette sections feature sofa-style seating that lets you enjoy the show in luxurious style. View Full Seating Chart   Purchase Tickets   Age 5+ (Anyone under age 18 must be accompanied by an adult) Cancellations Tickets are sold on a non-refundable and non-exchangeable basis. However, if you are unable to attend an event, please contact the ARIA Box Office at 1-877-253-5847 prior to the event taking place for further instructions. GROUP RESERVATIONS For group reservations of 12 or more guests to a single performance date, please call 702.352.0197 or 877.826.0255. Or e-mail us at Lasvegas.sales@cirquedusoleil.com   Cirque du Soleil Group Sales is open 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday - Friday (PST). Doors Open Approximately 45 minutes prior to showtime Stand-By Line Please note if the show date and/or performance time you are inquiring about has no tickets available, please inquire at the ARIA Box Office on the day of the performance for possible cancellations.   A stand-by list on the day of each performance is created 2 hours prior to each show time.
